name: getState
description: Get the current state and optionally subscribe to changes

params.name: include
params.description: state keys that should be included in the response. If undefined, all keys except any specifially excluded are included.

params.name: exclude
params.description: state keys that should not be included in the response.

params.name: subscribeToChanges
params.description: Subscribe to changes in the keys included in the request

result.name: state
result.description: the current state. For subscription updates, only keys for changed values will be included.
